TitleEnglish: Fate Stay Night: Unlimited Blade Works Abridged
SummaryEnglish: Fate/Stay Night Unlimited Blade Works Abridged is a parody series of ufotable's anime adaptation of the Unlimited Blade Works arc from the Fate/Stay Night light novel. It is written by TheAzureCrow and FrozenFrost, edited by TheAzureCrow, and produced by Project Mouthwash.

1.SummaryEnglish: Mouthwash Studios Fate Stay Night: Unlimited Blade Works Abridged Ep0

2.TitleEnglish: UBW:A Twitter Short I - "I Was Going To End Your Ideals... !!"

3.TitleEnglish: UBW:A Twitter Short II - "You Should Never-"

4.TitleEnglish: Fate/Stay Night: Heaven's Feel I - Presage Flower
4.SummaryEnglish: The first film in a trilogy adaptation of the third route of the popular visual novel: Fate/stay night. 10 years after the Holy Grail War—a battle waged by Masters and Servants over the wish-granting container, the Holy Grail—another war breaks out in Fuyuki City. Shirou Emiya—the adopted son of Kiritsugu Emiya, a participant of the previous Holy Grail War—is leading a peaceful life with people dear to him. Especially close to him is his underclassman Sakura Matou, who brings kindness into his otherwise lonely life. But once the Holy Grail War starts, Shirou’s peaceful life is sundered.

5.TitleEnglish: Fate/Stay Night: Heaven’s Feel II - Lost Butterfly
5.SummaryEnglish: The second film in a trilogy adaptation of the 3rd route of the popular visual novel: Fate/stay night. Shirou Emiya made his choice: to keep fighting, and to protect Sakura Matou. Due to the participation of Zouken Matou in the Holy Grail War, and his summoning of the Servant True Assassin, things begin to distort, steadily worsening day by day. Resolved to protect Sakura and not betray her, Shirou refuses to leave the battle. While Sakura worries about Shirou, she also finds herself entangled in her own fate as a mage. However, their fervent wishes are about be crushed by the mysterious black shadow that covers the city, killing Masters and Servants one by one…

6.TitleEnglish: Fate/Stay Night: Heaven's Feel III - Spring Song
6.SummaryEnglish: The third film in a trilogy adaptation of the 3rd route of the popular visual novel: Fate/stay night. To save the girl, to enact the justice he's chosen...The young man will no longer turn a blind eye to the truth. Mages (Masters) and Heroic Spirits (Servants) work together in the battles of the Holy Grail War, a fight for an omnipotent wish-granting container called the Holy Grail. However, this war has become horribly twisted. A young woman named Sakura Matou, with the sins she has committed, drowns in the murky darkness. A young man named Shirou Emiya, who vowed to protect Sakura, works together with Rin Tohsaka and throws himself into the raging battle to put a stop to the Holy Grail War. Illyasviel von Einzbern, as one of the few who knows the truth behind the conflict, confronts her own fate, while Zouken Matou uses Sakura to try to fulfill his own desires. Will the young man’s wish reach her even as he challenges fate itself, battling against the rising tide? The Holy Grail War

5.SummaryEnglish: After being attacked by Archer and just barely managing to survive, Shirou returns to school determined to show Rin what's what. Suddenly the school becomes a battlefield, with all of the student's lives on the line.

6.SummaryEnglish: Having been attacked by Rider at the school and realizing Caster's master must be their beloved teacher Kazuki, Rin and Shirou immediately set out to do him a death. Immediately. Like right away, that very moment. As Kazuki walks the kinda crazy walk home (like have you seen how far he walks?) he is confronted, and Shirou chooses this moment to confront the elephant in the room.

7.SummaryEnglish: In a desperate effort to draw out Caster, Rin takes the group on a date to the city across the river. They bicker, they argue, they sandwich. Then suddenly tragedy strikes, altering the fate (unlimited blade works) of the war moving forward. It’s hella sad.

1.SummaryEnglish: After Saber is taken by Caster, the group heads to the Kotomine church to try to get her back. While there, the tide of the war shifts as Rin loses her most trusted ally, just on the fringe of forcing him to admit to the secrets he’d been keeping. There are a lot of comments about butts.

2.SummaryEnglish: Shirou Emiya and Rin Tohsaka head toward the Einzbern castle, hoping to get the aid of Ilyasviel and Berserker. Little did they know that on this very day, at that very hour, another visit was there to destroy their plans. Just absolutely obliterate them.

3.SummaryEnglish: The final assault on Kotomine Church begins! With a new ally on hand, Rin and Shirou take the fight to Caster and look to end the Grail War. Just when things seem most hopeful, however, a new old familiar old enemy friend enemy appears/was always there actually.

4.SummaryEnglish: Failing his gamble to kill Shirou, Archer becomes desperate and reassesses. In the most climactic info dump the series has yet to see, Archer's origins and motivations are finally laid bare. Shinji's also being a creep. Just... just the worst. Like. Blech.
